Package org.wonderly.jini2

Interface Summary
ConfigurableJiniApplication.ObjectCreator<T>  
HttpServerAccess This interface defines access to a codebase server which allows a service to get the httpmd: URL information for accessing a particular jar file.
NameableObject This interface is used by objects that want to provide explicit naming control over their use of Configuration objects and other names where the package name and the objectname together make up a hierarchy of namespace.
 

Class Summary
ConfigurableJiniApplication This class provides the basic infrastructure for using a Configuration object in an application.
ConfigurableJiniApplication.AccessPermission  
HttpServerInfo This class is an Entry implementation that encapsulates all of the attributes of an http servers access.
HttpServerService This class provides a service that is an HTTP server information provider.
JiniAccess<T> This class provides support for simple lookup interfaces to the Jini LUS.
NameableObjectImpl This interface is used by objects that want to provide explicit naming control over their use of Configuration objects and other names where the package name and the objectname together make up a hierarchy of namespace.
PersistentJiniService This class provides a base class for creating persistant Jini services under the Jini 2.0 specifications.
PersistentJiniService.IDListener Class to listen for our serviceID if we don't have one yet This listener will write the learned service id out to the persistent stream.
PersistentJiniService.JoinContext Used to manage all the returned information from the static start() method
ServiceSelectionPane This class provides a mechanism to allow specific services to be selected for use by users.
ServiceSelector This class provides a mechanism to allow specific services to be selected for use by users via a JDialog.
